      protected void addAllParts(int indent, java.util.List<Product> list)
      Sets the indentation level for products in this Subassembly and all subparts
      double getCost()
      Returns a Double of the sum of all Products (Pieces and Subassembly) currently in the ArrayList of products of this Subassembly.
      double getManufactureTime()
      Returns a Double of the highest manufactureTime of all Products(Pieces and Subassembly) currently in the ArrayList of products of this Subassembly If no Product are in the List, then the sum returns 0.0

      Sorts the products in the Subassembly

    • Method Detail

      • getCost

        public double getCost()
        Returns a Double of the sum of all Products (Pieces and Subassembly) currently in the ArrayList of products of this Subassembly. If no Product are in the List, then the sum returns 0.0
        Specified by:
        getCost in class Product

      • getManufactureTime

        public double getManufactureTime()
        Returns a Double of the highest manufactureTime of all Products(Pieces and Subassembly) currently in the ArrayList of products of this Subassembly If no Product are in the List, then the sum returns 0.0
        Specified by:
        getManufactureTime in class Product
